summary: An artist meets a mysterious and wealthy benefactor and their relationship is not what it appears to be.
cast: Sarah Paulson|Wes Bentley|Corey Stoll|Frank Langella|Jeremy Allen White|Ahna O'Reilly|Gina Gallego|Ivan Shaw|Mila Brener|Aiden Lovekamp|Megan Kuhlmann|Sandra Seacat|Thurn Hoffman
title: The Time Being
